thumb.title: Our first soundtrack is here ! While demo is on the way i wanted to share our main game soundtrack.
thumb.description: Our first soundtrack is here ! While demo is on the way i wanted to share our main game soundtrack. My goal was to capture essence of pokemon like adventure in dangerous sea world. :) Hope you enjoy ! #gamesountrack #ohayo #gamemusic #indiedev #gamedevs #WishlistWednesday #fishhttps://store.steampowered.com/app/3690550/OHAYO_GIANTHOOK_Monster_Fishing_Adventure/?l=finnish
